metadata.dc:author: Olsen, P
Muñoz Villa, A
Herrero Díez, A
Martínez Rubio, A
Picazo, M L
metadata.dc:description: A case of lymphangiomatosis of bone in a 12-years old boy is presented. First bone lessions were seen at 6 1/2 years of age and the case had a progressive course. The only associated lymphatic malformation was a submandibular lymphangioma. The lymphography performed at the patient was normal. Literature about this subject is revised and evolutive possibilities and therapy are described.
metadata.dc:title: Linfangiomatosis de hueso.
[Bone lymphangiomatosis (author's transl)].
